Text:
Please seed this game !
If you have Spyro the Dragon please upload. Thanx!

Spyro the Dragon is already up. You can get it here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3545640/Spyro_the_Dragon_PAL_PSX

And no, I haven't tried it out, and I don't feel like doing so. I do have a copy of the game myself, but uploading it now seems unnecessary. And besides, it has a few tiny audio issues (some of the music does not play perfectly).
